name: NFCVASReaderSessionDelegate
desc: A protocol that an object implements to receive callbacks from a VAS reader session.

items.name: func readerSessionDidBecomeActive(NFCVASReaderSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the reader session is active.

items.name: func readerSession(NFCVASReaderSession, didReceive: [NFCVASResponse])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the reader session received a VAS response.

items.name: class NFCVASResponse
items.desc: An object representing the response from a single GET VAS DATA command.

items.name: func readerSession(NFCVASReaderSession, didInvalidateWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session become invalid and provides the reason.
